title: Here is a list of 20 articles on end-to-end speech translation up to 2021. These articles cover various aspects of the field, including models, techniques, and evaluations
**"End-to-End Speech Translation without Speech Recognition"**
**"Jointly Learning to Align and Translate with Transformer Models"** - Ankur Bapna
**"Direct Speech-to-Text Translation with Transformer"** - Ye Jia, Melvin Johnson
All-in-One Speech Translation Toolkit"** - Hirofumi Inaguma
**"A Comparative Study on End-to-End Speech to Text Translation"**
publisher: Matthias Sperber, Graham Neubig, Jan Niehues, Alex Waibel

title: **"End-to-End Speech Translation with Transcoder"**
**"Self-Supervised Learning for End-to-End Speech Translation"** - Alexei Baevski
**"Improving End-to-End Speech Translation by Leveraging Auxiliary Text Translation"**
**"End-to-End Speech Translation with Pre-trained Models"**
**"Multilingual End-to-End Speech Translation"** - Changhan Wang, Anne Wu
**"End-to-End Speech Translation with Knowledge Distillation"** - Eunah Cho
**"Speech-Transformer: A No-Recurrence Sequence-to-Sequence Model for Speech Recognition"** - Linhao Dong
**"End-to-End Speech Translation with Pre-trained Models and Online Knowledge Distillation"** - Eunah Cho
